channel.title: Lag in server
channel.description: when i am editing my server and after a while it starts to lag like it takes one step, waits 5 seconds, then moves again.how do i fix rthis problem? - joe

item.title: Lag in server
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:375872”]- Remove the shitty customs from your client

  • Clean up process() { in client.java
  • Make new classes to handle your packets
  • Or just get a new source :|[/quote]

i dont know how to clean up the process, i dont know how to make new classes, dont have any customs and i got so far on this source… anything else?
